caption: Worst experience ever. Went on a cold night. Asked about heaters and we were rudely told no propane. This person was slower than a turtle and had no customer service skills. Thank goodness we had a different server. She did a good job but the food was terrible. I wouldn’t go back if it was free.
Excellent food and great beer choices. Great service as well, won't be disappointed going to this place, one of our new favorites.
In a strip mall...food for lunch solid but not memorable.   Will try dinner to be fair.
Service was good, beer was good, food was good but sitting outside after dark was COLD & they don't have ENOUGH propane heaters!!! So if u go there better be dressed to be sitting in the cold.

So, during the Covid pandemic it took 3 attempts to eat here. Twice they were closed during their posted hours. Now that we finally got to try it I can say the food was very tasty but the service was lacking and slow. The waitress was …
The best by Far, yumm
My first time here was Halloween evening.  I had the pumpkin beer with the omg blt...hit the spot.  Service was great and so was the downtown atsmophere. It is a great date or family spot.

The food could be really good if the service was better.  I ordered just frys once and they were so cold by the time they brought them to me.  Then I ordered a salad and they started serving others who ordered quite some time after me. …
Excellent time on a warm night. Beers quite good. Had a sour and a Porter. Foods are good. Friendly staff to boot!
Great service, food, and beers.  I get the eggplant sandwich and the carne asada fries.  The bf likes the fish tacos and fried mac n cheese balls.
Good beers, Great food, Friendly staff.

The food was really good I ordered the steack. The eating part is only done outside but that's a given right. I order and was having a cigarette so they directed me to a smoking area. I order as soon I got there n well I had the desert of churro n ice cream so good yet do much sugar but it definitely satisfied my sweet tooth.

Featuring pleasant outdoor seating and a comfy taproom that is among the area’s most popular, Hops & Sessions is a trendy culinary attraction founded in Livermore in 2018.  Hops & Sessions is the valley’s first pour-your-own taproom; guests …
Beer.....can you ever go wrong?
Outdoor dining, great beer, great food, friendly service....perfect!
Tasty cocktails with a view.
Have been here a few times before the Shelter in Place took over and I miss it already. Great drinks and system. Hoping to come by soon again! Hang in there!
Self pour brewery, interedting concept

Great atmosphere, people are friendly. If you have a group of friends and just want to hang out this is a great place to grab a drink and eat some food. They also have a good selection of bored games.
Nice place
I wished they had more amber to stout options. Their medium to dark options are limited but overall it's a good time.
Love how you can dispense only the amount you want to drink.
Neat experience with pouring your own beer . Good selection.
Loved the selections and having the freedom to choose small pours.
Great place to go, you can bring the kids and they have games to keep them busy while you have a drink
Love that place 😎
Excellent food and beer too!

My wife and I spend plenty of time downtown as Livermore residents and this place is unique, fun, and always has great service.  You can sample as much or as little of so many beers.  Great way to figure out what you like.  The food is …
Loved it:)
Can take the wine drinking wife while taking care of improving your Untappd stats.
Best food ever!!
Confusing way to serve/beer tasting and expensive..

Downtown Livermore is super cute! We went here after family said this place is really good. Its pretty cool idea. You check in and they give you a wristband and when you go to the wall of beer you scan your wrist and start pouring your …
The trivia night is awesome!
It's like a never ending happy hour bar.
Great selection of beers and the staff is cool af.
The beer is a bit pricey, but the atmosphere and food are great.

We were in Livermore looking for a place to get a beer and food. First time in a self pour establishment. We liked the concept loved being able to sample a lot of different beers. Plus my wife liked that she could pour the amount she wanted, which is usually less than a full pint. Food was delicious and the staff was fantastic.
Fun atmosphere and the fried Mac and cheese was delicious.
Do not go here for food.
Lolita and Trinity are the best!
Chicken sandwich is really good! Great staff!

(Translated by Google) Pleasant comfortable and cozy place, variety of beers and friendly and quick attention, but the dispensers fail to serve; the options of snack are quite adequate and with a rich flavor.  (Original) Agradable lugar …
Pricey, serve yourself beer place. If the tap only gives you foam, you're still paying by the ounce. No thanks.

Before getting beer in front of the many dispensaries for a pint or glass of your own medicine, present your ID for age and credit card for checking out later. An electronic wrist will then be provided that will serve as a key to activate …
Lots of choices for beers and ciders, as well as a few options for wines. Food was creative craft bar food and good.
Good selection and some good food to complement.
It rocks cuz my daughter works there

I really like Hops and Sessions, its clean, no line, and the only wait is for the food. The food is fantastic by the way. The pretzels are loaded and the beer cheese is great, the hummus plate is the best I've had, and the burgers have that …

A beer hall style venue with friendly and helpful staff on hand to explain the 3 ciders, 2 wines, and 25 beers on tap each representing Californian breweries with styles that quench all types of appetite. The brain meltdown begins when they …
Staff is very friendly!
Really cool atmosphere and concept. Make sure to only get one pretzel for two people, unless you're starving.

Wack! They charge for every drip!  Its a great business model, no beer unpaid.  You pay to pour your beer by the ounce.  What if the tap is not good and all you get is foam?  Still got to pay. This is a fad, just go to a brewery where beer …
Cool self serve taps and great food 👍
It was really crowded but the beer selection was great and the food was really good!
Open concept pour your own beer great atmosphere
Love the band scan and beer tasting!

Great place, good friendly service and really nice selection of beers. Food was tasty and served quickly (got the jalapeno pretzel - worth checking out). Self-serve system seems to work well and is reasonably priced.
Cool Place, Good Atmosphere, Pour Your Own Beer! Decent Selection. Small Food Menu, But Good, A Little Pricey For Self Service.
Its an interesting place, but the table was sticky, some of the beers were forming. The burger was good and the fries were delicious.
Great night! Great selection, just do it your way.
Awesome experience! Just wish the prices were a bit lower!
If you come at the right time you can get a glass of beer in your hand within 1 minute of walking in the door. Simple Menu, top notch quality food. Great selection in beers all on tap.
Pour yourself concept is interesting. Nice selection of local beers.

Surprisingly good atmosphere on a Monday with a helpful staff, only complaint would be the beer cut off which maybe should be pushed to 70.0 oz other than that the staff were always on hand and helpful.
Pretty cool place. The pretzel was amazing. Novel idea to do the wrist band pour your own beer thing. Probably come back sometime to see if the experience is consistently fun.
Delicious food and plenty of great beers to choose from!
Great food. Great beer.
Yummy food!
Decent selection of beer, plus you can sample at will because it's by the ounce. Fish tacos are good.
Awesome beers, great food, what else could you ask for.  A must go!
Great place for beer. Some 20+ beers on tap. Self-service from taps, pour yourself. Great pretzel.
A fresh, new welcome face in downtown Livermore: About 30 self-pour craft beer taps, good variety, and a few nibbles to enjoy as well. Communal seating rounds out the casual atmosphere.
What a superb place to grab a pint.  Or two.  Really cool to just have free reign to try whatever beer sounds good.

We went in on a Thursday night, it wasn't too crowded. I have a gluten allergy and asked if they had any gluten friendly menu items. They were clueless. They weren't helpful or very accommodating. Their tap machines didn't seem to stop at …
Really enjoyed eating and drinking here! Lovely food, lovely service, and good choice of beer. My only suggestion would be a different type of bun for the burger so that the it doesnt get soggy.
Excellent food.. Great service.. Nice atmosphere..
Dont wait for the bar keep to serve you. Serve your self as much or little as you want. A great idea! Love the place
An interesting concept, pouring your own beer. But there's a wide variety to choose from.
Beer selection is good, food is very good,  worth a return visit.

A novel gastropub concept that needs a little tweaking in the layout...  I understand that self service with such a wide selection is cool for a tap room.  However, I prefer a bartender or server.  The autotaps have slight learning curve …

Very cool concept! Self pour beer using the wristband they give you. They have tons of beer here so you’re bound to find something you like! My favorite was the spire cider, it went perfect with the chicken wings I got. It’s a bit pricey …
Huge fan! Brilliant plan to have everyone pour the beers that they want, whenever they want, in whatever quantity they prefer. Food is delicious.

Cool concept, a self-serve beer spot with upscale bar food. We got truffle fries and they were good, but for $8 not that big, it should have been a larger portion. The reason I gave 4 stars and not 5 is the cost. The beers are all over .50 …

Cool concept! Unfortunately when my girlfriend and I went we could not find anything we enjoyed. I enjoy a pretty vast selection of beers but theirs were all underwhelming and almost tasted watered down. Nice vibe and interior but very …

Great location across from Bankhead Theater and an awesome environment. You can sample a bunch of different craft beers before you pick a favorite, and the food is really well done. Very clean eating with beautiful presentation, and there are lots of options depending on what you are in the mood for.
Refreshing place in Livermore!  Some place different to have a beer.  Love it!

Perfect for a casual after-work gathering, you can arrive, get some very good food quickly, sample some beers, and head out without having to worry about separate checks due to the innovative RFID wristband system. If you're coming for a …

I got the hops burger with fries. The meal was $15. For the money, you'll get better food, better atmosphere, and better prices with better service at the Ale House. I'll give it another try in a month or so and see if it's changed since they just opened.
It was awesome to pour your own beer. Definitely someplace to stop by for 1 or multiple drinks. It's a literal Beer Buffet!
Great atmosphere, good service and good food. Overall great place.
Food is just as good as the beer!

I really like the pay per oz. Concept.  You can serve yourself and just buy a small amount to try a beer.. if you like it go back and get more or try something else. I might suggest they add some sound deadening decor so it's not so loud and hollow. I hope the expand the food menu. I'll definitely go back.
Very unique and interesting style, loved it!
Awesome tap house, I could taste so many bears before committing to a very nice Belgian Ale... and the food is nice too, they have a chorizo sausage on a bun with coleslaw that was super tasty!
Friendly staff, good selection of beers, more wine selection coming soon I hear.  The sausages are awesome!!!

I first came here during their soft opening and was immediately impressed by their setup. I've seen other places in the U.S. and Europe where you can pour your own beer, but this is by far the nicest establishment I've seen so far. I enjoy …

It's a great idea, but it's kinda pricey for the beer imo.  Why are pints suddenly like 9 dollars?  The selection is OK, but there are other options nearby as well.    Didn't try the food, but it looked pretty good.  I'll probably come back through, but I wouldn't seek it out necessarily.
Great new place! Diego is very helpful :) we had a fun time choosing which beers to try and loved being able to choose the amount to fill in our glass each time.

Great local spot for self serve beer. The selection ranges from local to nationally known and includes wine. Food pairs well with the beers.  Located right in downtown Livermore. Definitely will be coming back!

Love the concept.   Nice selection of beers,  only 2 wines but we came for beer.  You are charged by the ounce.  also ate there.  Not a huge selection but what we had was very good.  definetely will go back
Awesome easy 5 stars self serve beers
